## Prosthetics design

Prosthetics are always improving, especially lower limb prosthetics, as restoring ambulation is one of the most important processes in physical rehabilitation.
Despite improvements in lower limb prosthetics, upper limb prosthetics have been left behind, still using simplistic pylley systems.
